text: PrinceAlthough – in accordance with the system adopted by the Japanese imperial government from the Meiji period through the end of WWII – the official English translation of Konoe's title was "prince", the title of kōshaku () was actually a closer equivalent to "duke". was a Japanese politician and prime minister from 1937 to 1939 and again from 1940 to 1941. ==References== ==Other websites== *Konoe biography from Spartacus Educational *Annotated bibliography for Fumimaro Konoe from the Alsos Digital Library for Nuclear Issues * Fumimaro Konoe and Asian Pacific War Category:1891 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Drug-related suicides Category:Former dictators Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Foreign ministers of Japan
title: Fumimaro Konoe
